name: get_app_reviews
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ios_store.
Tool description: Get API access to iOS Store data
API description: This endpoint allows us to fetch app reviews given app Id

sort.description:
This parameter is to control sorting options in the iOS store.
Valid values - helpful | recent

country.description: The country code for the iOS store to fetch reviews from.

page.description: The page number of the reviews to fetch.

appid.description: The ID of the app for which to fetch reviews.
